title: HSDL | The nation's premier collection of homeland security documents
description: The nation's premier collection of documents related to homeland security policy, strategy, and organizational management.
cleaned_text: How Can I Use the HSDL? [Search for Resources](https://www.hsdl.org/c/search/) Search over 250,000 Save your search criteria and we will automatically email you a list of any matching resources added in the last week.
